name: Grilled Baked Potatoes
author: TODD SCHULTZ
summary: I was tired of eating baked potatoes the old fashioned way with gobs of butter,  so I created this simple recipe to put a little twist on them.  My family and  friends love them and I hope you do too.
directions: Place the potatoes into a large pot with water to cover
Bring to a boil and cook over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, or until tender
Preheat the grill to medium-high heat
Drain potatoes and toss with olive oil, black pepper, rosemary and salt to taste
Place the potatoes skin-side down over indirect heat on the grill and reserve liquid
Remove potatoes to a serving plate and sprinkle with the reserved olive oil mixture
